channel.title: Have you been 'hare' before? on Blist Multilingual Theme

item.title: European hare, West Midlands, England (© Jake Stephen/Moment/Getty Images)
item.description: 图文来源自：bing. copyright: © Jake Stephen/Moment/Getty Images Springtime brings a whirlwind of activity across the European meadows. The European or brown hare bursts into a frenzy of what is dubbed ‘March madness.’ Britain’s fastest land mammals become a captivating sight, chasing and ‘boxing’ in the fields. Native to Europe and parts of Asia, these hares’ tawny coat is perfect camouflage for the temperate, open landscapes they favour. Their diet of grasses and herbs, and in winter, twigs and bark, fuels their remarkable bursts of speed, essential for outrunning predators.
